item.title: By: unbeliever
item.dc:creator: unbeliever
item.description:
Jesus, whatever the name of the central characters will be, there'll be a million new alts with variations hours after the films launch.
Oh well, suppose it could be a frefreshing change from the thousands of leegoolas's running around.
item.content:encoded:
Jesus, whatever the name of the central characters will be, there’ll be a million new alts with variations hours after the films launch.

Oh well, suppose it could be a frefreshing change from the thousands of leegoolas’s running around.

item.title: By: Marlowe
item.dc:creator: Marlowe
item.content:encoded:
Here’s one where the old “2. ???” joke might not apply.

1. Make Warcraft Movie
2. “Hey subscribers, go see the movie and get this free in-game trinket”
3. PROFIT!
4. “Hey subscribers, go buy the DVD and get another free in-game trinket”
5. PROFIT! AGAIN!

item.title: By: Staarkhand
item.dc:creator: Staarkhand
item.description:
Maybe it will be rated R and 80% of the people who show up for it will be stuck outside trying to get 'authenticated'..?..?.. Anyone?
Wow, that was even less funny than I thought.
I'd watch a feature film version of Illegal Danish.
item.content:encoded:
Maybe it will be rated R and 80% of the people who show up for it will be stuck outside trying to get ‘authenticated’..?..?.. Anyone?

Wow, that was even less funny than I thought.

I’d watch a feature film version of Illegal Danish.

item.title: By: Saccia
item.dc:creator: Saccia
item.description: But what I want to know is will there be n00bs running around the "band of heros" shouting, "D00d will yuo sing my guild chater?!? I just ned one more naem".
item.content:encoded: But what I want to know is will there be n00bs running around the “band of heros” shouting, “D00d will yuo sing my guild chater?!? I just ned one more naem”.

item.title: By: Vargen
item.dc:creator: Vargen
item.description:
Dude, no real gamer is going to settle for only 24 fps.
Well, except in Ironforge.
item.content:encoded:
Dude, no real gamer is going to settle for only 24 fps.
